feed.title: Time to add CSFS to Signet?

entry.title: Time to add CSFS to Signet?
entry.summary: The email inquires about the community's viewpoint on incorporating CSFS into Signet, particularly in combination with CTV, which has been part of Signet for several years. The integration of both CTV and CSFS is viewed positively by many within the community, highlighting its potential to facilitate experiments related to LNHANCE. An important technical consideration discussed is the role of CSFS in enhancing BitVM operations. Specifically, CSFS could replace Winternitz signatures, offering a solution that significantly reduces the on-chain data availability overhead. This technical improvement is crucial for applications that rely on the combined functionality of CTV and CSFS, indicating a forward-looking approach to blockchain development and experimentation. The email underscores the sender's interest in gathering feedback on this proposition, reflecting an ongoing dialogue within the Bitcoin Development community, as evidenced by the recipient's subscription to the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" group.
